name: UnderDog (LinneaHarrison)
description:
A little game made over the Halloween weekend by a handful of game developers up at a cozy cabin in the swedish woods.

Play as an underworld guide dog and help souls find their way to a happily ever after-life. Avoid bad guys, and bork your way to success!

Game is playable with WASD, arrow keys, or a controller on PC.

Special thanks goes out to the gamedev dogs Tesla and Misha!

Enjoy!
